about_the_game:
The DLC contains 6 animated 2D images of priestesses of love with a resolution of 870 x 1080 pixels in both GIF and MP4 format.
All animations are NSFW. This DLC features animations that you unlock as you progress through Hero of Luxuria in Infinite Mode.

content_descriptors.notes: The animation DLC contains sexual content, nudity and BDSM. The Animation DLC contains animated 2D nude images of mythical creatures such as naga and mermaid.

detailed_description:
The DLC contains 6 animated 2D images of priestesses of love with a resolution of 870 x 1080 pixels in both GIF and MP4 format.
All animations are NSFW. This DLC features animations that you unlock as you progress through Hero of Luxuria in Infinite Mode.
